CheckMagicNumbers - Class in critter2.checks
Warns against using magic numbers outside of declarations (except 0, 1, and 2 in case statements.) Additionally warns against using #define because all #defines are replaced during the preprocessing done by CritterDriver.

G

getFilename(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the filename of the file in which a parse tree node occurs (based on the pragmas inserted during the annotating Critter script)
getLineNumber(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the line number (based on the pragmas inserted during the annotating Critter script)
getPrevious(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the previous node in the parse tree
getPreviousNonPragma(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the previous node in the parse tree that is not a pragma annotation
getPreviousPragma(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the previous node in the parse tree that is a pragma annotation

L

linecount(Traversable) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Returns the number of lines contained in the parse tree node node.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class critter2.Critter
Entry point for Cetus; creates a new Driver object, and calls run on it with args.

N

nextNoInclude(Iterator<Traversable>) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Filters any iterator, skipping all included header files (standard and user-created).
nextNoStdInclude(Iterator<Traversable>) - Method in class critter2.CritterCheck
Filters any iterator but skipping all the standard included header files.

P
